Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-50181 affecting package python-virtualenv for versions less than 20.26.6-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-50181 affecting package python-virtualenv for versions less than 20.26.6-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-virtualenv is earlier than 20.26.6-2, affected by CVE-2025-50181
